input.sentences: halloween this year was the best because the kids were old enough to go trick or treating .
we first played some games at home .
we started trick or treating at 5pm and the neighbors were gracious and gave us a lot of candy .
we joined the other neighborhood kids .
the last neighbor gave us a ton of candy .
output.sentences: The kids dressed up for Halloween.
There were many games for kids to play,
and many opportunities to collect candy.
The children had fun playing in the group activities.
Even the adults dressed for the festivities.
